sections.title: Punishment for Murder
sections.description: Whoever commits murder shall be punished with death or imprisonment for life, and shall also be liable to fine.
sections.punishment: Death or Life Imprisonment and Fine
procedure: File FIR immediately at nearest police station
examples: Murder during commission of another crime
Death caused with intent to kill

sections.title: Punishment for Culpable Homicide Not Amounting to Murder
sections.description: Whoever commits culpable homicide not amounting to murder shall be punished with imprisonment for life or imprisonment up to 10 years and fine.
sections.punishment: Life Imprisonment or up to 10 years and Fine
examples: Death caused without intention but with knowledge
Causing death by rash or negligent act
Death in sudden fight without premeditation

sections.title: Punishment for Voluntarily Causing Hurt
sections.description: Whoever, except in the case provided for by section 334, voluntarily causes hurt, shall be punished with imprisonment up to one year, or with fine up to Rs. 1,000, or both.
sections.punishment: Imprisonment up to 1 year or Fine up to Rs. 1,000 or Both

sections.title: Punishment for Voluntarily Causing Grievous Hurt
sections.description: Whoever, except in the case provided for by section 335, voluntarily causes grievous hurt, shall be punished with imprisonment up to 7 years and fine.
sections.punishment: Imprisonment up to 7 years and Fine
examples: Loss or impairment of any organ

sections.title: Assault or Criminal Force to Woman with Intent to Outrage Her Modesty
sections.description: Whoever assaults or uses criminal force to any woman, intending to outrage or knowing it to be likely that he will thereby outrage her modesty, shall be punished with imprisonment up to 5 years and fine.
sections.punishment: Imprisonment from 1 to 5 years and Fine
procedure: File complaint at women's police station

sections.title: Punishment for Rape
sections.description: Whoever commits rape shall be punished with rigorous imprisonment for not less than 10 years which may extend to life imprisonment and fine.
sections.punishment: Rigorous Imprisonment 10 years to Life and Fine

sections.title: Punishment for Theft
sections.description: Whoever commits theft shall be punished with imprisonment up to 3 years, or with fine, or both.
sections.punishment: Imprisonment up to 3 years or Fine or Both

sections.title: Punishment for Robbery
sections.description: Whoever commits robbery shall be punished with rigorous imprisonment up to 10 years and fine. If armed with deadly weapon, up to 14 years.
sections.punishment: Rigorous Imprisonment up to 10-14 years and Fine

sections.title: Punishment for Criminal Breach of Trust
sections.description: Whoever commits criminal breach of trust shall be punished with imprisonment up to 3 years, or with fine, or both.
sections.punishment: Imprisonment up to 3 years or Fine or Both

sections.title: Cheating and Dishonestly Inducing Delivery of Property
sections.description: Whoever cheats and thereby dishonestly induces the person deceived to deliver any property shall be punished with imprisonment up to 7 years and fine.
sections.punishment: Imprisonment up to 7 years and Fine
procedure: File FIR/complaint at cybercrime cell (if online)

sections.title: Forgery of Valuable Security, Will, etc.
sections.description: Whoever forges a document purporting to be a valuable security or will, or authority to transfer valuable security, shall be punished with imprisonment for life or up to 10 years and fine.
sections.punishment: Life Imprisonment or up to 10 years and Fine

sections.title: Forgery for Purpose of Cheating
sections.description: Whoever commits forgery intending that the document forged shall be used for the purpose of cheating, shall be punished with imprisonment up to 7 years and fine.
sections.punishment: Imprisonment up to 7 years and Fine
procedure: Report to police with forged documents

sections.title: Husband or Relative of Husband Subjecting Woman to Cruelty
sections.description: Whoever, being the husband or relative of the husband of a woman, subjects such woman to cruelty shall be punished with imprisonment up to 3 years and fine.
sections.punishment: Imprisonment up to 3 years and Fine
procedure: File complaint at women's police station

sections.title: Intentional Insult with Intent to Provoke Breach of Peace
sections.description: Whoever intentionally insults and thereby gives provocation to any person, intending to provoke breach of peace, shall be punished with imprisonment up to 2 years or fine or both.
sections.punishment: Imprisonment up to 2 years or Fine or Both

sections.title: Punishment for Criminal Intimidation
sections.description: Whoever commits criminal intimidation shall be punished with imprisonment up to 2 years or fine or both. If threat is of death or grievous hurt, up to 7 years or fine or both.
sections.punishment: Imprisonment up to 2-7 years or Fine or Both

sections.title: Word, Gesture or Act Intended to Insult the Modesty of a Woman
sections.description: Whoever intending to insult the modesty of any woman, utters any word, makes any sound or gesture, or exhibits any object, shall be punished with simple imprisonment up to 3 years and fine.
sections.punishment: Simple Imprisonment up to 3 years and Fine
procedure: File complaint at women's police station

sections.title: Punishment for Attempting to Commit Offences
sections.description: Whoever attempts to commit an offence punishable by imprisonment for life or imprisonment, shall be punished with imprisonment up to half the longest term provided for the offence.
sections.punishment: Up to half of the maximum punishment for the attempted offence
procedure: Trial based on attempted offence severity

sections.title: Punishment for Cheating by Personation Using Computer Resource (IT Act)
sections.description: Whoever, by means of any communication device or computer resource cheats by personation, shall be punished with imprisonment up to 3 years and fine up to Rs. 1 lakh.
sections.punishment: Imprisonment up to 3 years and Fine up to Rs. 1 lakh
procedure: Preserve all digital evidence (emails, messages, screenshots)
examples: Fake social media profiles for fraud

sections.title: Punishment for Violation of Privacy (IT Act)
sections.description: Whoever intentionally captures, publishes or transmits the image of a private area of any person without consent shall be punished with imprisonment up to 3 years or fine up to Rs. 2 lakh or both.
sections.punishment: Imprisonment up to 3 years or Fine up to Rs. 2 lakh or Both

sections.title: Definition of Rape
sections.description: A man is said to commit rape if he has sexual intercourse with a woman under circumstances falling under specified descriptions without her consent or with consent obtained under fear, misconception, or when she is incapable of giving consent.
sections.punishment: See Section 376

sections.title: Acts Done by Several Persons in Furtherance of Common Intention
sections.description: When a criminal act is done by several persons in furtherance of the common intention of all, each person is liable as if he alone committed the act.
sections.punishment: Same as the main offence committed
procedure: Applied along with main offence section
